intro: Romantic love comedy with six unique students from abroad
description:
Spring has arrived, and love is in the air! Get ready to fall head over heels in love with the unique characters in the fully-voiced romantic visual novel game, "Dormitory Love."

Set in a student dormitory in Tokyo, this game follows the story of Jun Minase, who suddenly finds herself working as the dorm manager for a group of international students.

This game is an absolute must-have if you're interested in Japanese culture and love stories featuring charming and unforgettable characters.

With six love interests to choose from, there's someone for everyone. You can pursue the calm and serious German, Felix, or the selfish yet charming femboy Frenchman, Guillaume. Alternatively, you might fall for the star basketball player from the United States, Josh, or the enigmatic and mysterious Chinese student, Ling. Perhaps you'll be drawn to the gentle and carefree Russian photographer, Sasha, or the cynical British nerd, Sean.

As you guide Jun through the spring and summer seasons, you'll experience a variety of seasonal events, including cherry blossom viewing, a hot spring trip, visits to a water park, and a summer festival, all while building your own love story with one of the six unique characters. Along the way, you'll laugh, cry, and experience all the ups and downs of romance.

Features include the ability to customize the heroine's name, full voice acting, nearly 100 still images, and six rich love stories to experience. In addition, you'll gain detailed cultural insights into the Japanese way of life, making this game a truly immersive and unforgettable experience.
